main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified aerial objects were reported in Richmond, Virginia on August 7, 1952.
interesting points: Observations were made by multiple Air Force personnel including Lt. David M. Groner and 2d Lt. Donald H. Ware., Objects were circular and white, traveling at high speeds., The sightings lasted around 25 minutes with objects moving towards the horizon., Observers concluded that one object visible was likely the distant planet Venus., No other aircraft or jet trails were observed during the sightings.
sighted object: three circular lights in the sky
